title: Research Self-Healing Concrete Mechanisms
description: Investigate the mechanisms of self-healing concrete using bacterial or chemical agents.

title: Design Bacterial or Chemical Self-Healing Agent Strains
description: Create designs for self-healing agent strains that can effectively repair cracks in concrete.

title: Develop Production Process for Self-Healing Concrete Mixing
description: Design and develop a process for producing self-healing concrete, including the mixing of the agent with traditional ingredients.
dependencies: Design Bacterial or Chemical Self-Healing Agent Strains

title: Test and Refine Self-Healing Concrete Production Process
description: Conduct tests on the self-healing concrete production process to ensure it is effective and refine as needed.
dependencies: Develop Production Process for Self-Healing Concrete Mixing

title: Create Documentation for Self-Healing Concrete Production
description: Write and compile documentation on the self-healing concrete production process.
dependencies: Test and Refine Self-Healing Concrete Production Process
